property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, ready a target [Space Marine] unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Attached unit gains Flying.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains Immune to enemy events.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Destroy a target card in reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is ready it gains Flying. Reaction: After this unit readies, have your opponent deal 4 indirect damage among units they control at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction:After you deploy this unit, ready a target [Ork] unit you control at this planet and deal it 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a combat round at this planet begins, return a [Chaos] Power event from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, Daemon units at this planet cannot be damaged by units with cost 2 or lower until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains Armorbane while attacking a damaged enemy unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support and sacrifice a Khymera token to ready a Creature army unit you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the command phase begins, look at a card your opponent controls in reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit resolves an attack, ready it. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. While attacking a non-Warlord unit, attached unit gets +2 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a battle at this planet begins, gain 1[Resource].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After damage from an attack by this unit has been assigned, reassign any amount of that damage to another enemy unit at this planet. (Limit once per attack.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Remove an infestation token from this planet to trigger its Battle ability. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a combat round begins at this planet, deal 1 damage to a target enemy unit at this planet with printed cost 2 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains, 'Interrupt: When this unit is targeted by a triggered effect for the first time this round, cancel that effect.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to move an Elite unit you control to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike a card, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, deal 2 damage to a target enemy army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to put a target unit you control at a planet in reserve.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, you gain the initiative in this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Reaction: After you Deep Strike a card, attached unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control 3 or more support cards this unit gains Mobile and Ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to give a target unit +X HP until the end of the phase. X is the highest printed cost among units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a unit you control at this planet is declared as an attacker, your opponent cannot trigger effects until after that attack resolves.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an [Ork] army unit you control. Attached unit gains the Nob trait. Each army unit you control at this planet gains a command icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a Cultist unit at this planet to draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Interrupt: When attached unit leaves play, move an army unit you control to this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, destroy a target Ally unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Deal 1 damage to a target non- Elite army unit. Then, shuffle this card back into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains Flying.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, you may deploy each [Eldar] unit in your hand at this planet as though it had Ambush until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each unit with printed cost 2 or lower at this planet cannot attack while a unit with printed cost 3 or higher at this planet is ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Pilot or Vehicle unit you control. Deploy Action: Sacrifice this attachment to deal 3 damage to a target enemy army unit in your opponent's HQ or destroy a target support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a command struggle at this planet, until the end of the round, this unit gains 'Hive Mind - Each Termagant token you control at this planet gains Armorbane.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy an Elite unit, exhaust this support to put 2 Termagant tokens into play at the same planet as that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each unit with printed cost 2 or lower at this planet gets -1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, until the end of this battle's first combat round, reduce all damage taken by [Necron] units you control to 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a unit you control is being dealt damage, support cards in your hand may be used as shield cards with 1 shield icon. If the shielded card is a Tank, that support card has 2 shield icons instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you use a shield card to prevent this unit from taking damage, that card gains 1 shield icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at a planet with your warlord, put an [Astra Militarum] support card from your discard pile into play at your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Ready a target Tank unit you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Vehicle unit you control. Attached unit gains 1 command icon. Action: Exhaust your warlord to move attached unit to another planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit readies, deal 1 damage to each enemy unit damaged by this unit this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains, 'Action: Pay 1[Resource] to ready this unit. (Limit once per round.)'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike a card, deal 1 damage to an enemy army unit at the same planet as that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the combat phase begins, each enemy army unit at this planet loses all keywords until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move up to 2 damage from a target [Ork] unit you control to a target non-Elite army unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains 'Cannot be routed or exhausted by card effects.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the combat phase begins, sacrifice this support to reverse the order in which planets are checked for battles. (Start with the last planet and finish with the first planet.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit with printed cost 2 or lower deals damage to this unit by an attack, rout that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Each non-Elite army unit dealt damage by attached unit's attack cannot ready this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is chosen as a defender, exhaust a Hardpoint attachment on it to cancel that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After units are committed to this planet, deal 3 damage to an exhausted enemy unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to switch the location of two army units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the ranged skirmish at this planet ends, ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, move any number of units you control at this planet to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains Brutal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an enemy army unit with printed cost 2 or lower. Attached unit cannot be readied.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit assigns damage by an attack, remove 1 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you remove any amount of damage from a [Necron] army unit you control, gain 1N.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit enters play, deal it 2 unpreventable damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After an army unit enters play, deal it 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Target a planet. Remove 1 damage from each [Necron] unit you control at the targeted planet and deal 1 damage to each non-[Necron] unit at the targeted planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +1 ATK. Combat Action: Exhaust this attachment to remove 1 damage from a [Necron] unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, it cannot be targeted by enemy card effects until the end of the first combat round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Each player exhausts a unit he controls with the highest printed cost among units he controls. Then, each unit exhausted by this effect deals X damage, where X is its ATK value, to the other player's unit exhausted by this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a Vehicle unit you control at this planet is assigned damage, exhaust this unit to prevent up to 2 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Attached unit gets +2 ATK. Damage cannot be removed from units at the same planet as attached unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an [Ork] unit you control at this planet resolves an attack, move it to an adjacent planet or your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each card you control in reserve is treated as a 2 ATK, 2 HP [Ork] army unit during the combat phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Draw X cards. X is the highest printed cost among units you control. Then, discard 4 cards from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you declare this unit as an attacker, move a Khymera token from an adjacent planet to this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, target a non-Elite army unit in your opponent's HQ. Move the targeted unit to this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: As an additional cost to deploy this card, discard 2 cards from your hand. Reaction: After an army unit is destroyed at this planet, draw 1 card and deal 1 damage to a target enemy unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an [Eldar] army unit you control. Interrupt: When attached unit would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains Mobile. Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each card you control in reserve is counted as a command icon at its planet when resolving command struggles.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, destroy up to 2 target enemy support cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this event, commit either your warlord or a synapse unit you control to this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your opponent targets a unit you control at this planet with a triggered effect, cancel that effect.(Limit once per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you cancel a card effect put this unit into play from your hand at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your opponent targets a single unit with a card effect, exhaust this support to change the target of that effect to a target unit you control (ignoring targeting restrictions).

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a card effect targets a unit, cancel that effect. If the targeted unit was a unit you control, ready your warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to your warlord. Reaction: After an enemy unit at this planet triggers an ability, deal 1 damage to that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is attacking it gets +2 ATK for each command icon the defender has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. While each other unit you control at this planet is exhausted, attached unit gets +5 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Increase the Deep Strike value of each card your opponent controls at this planet by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a Vehicle unit you control is destroyed, gain resources equal to its printed cost. Max 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, have your opponent deal 2 indirect damage among exhausted units he controls at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Forced Reaction: After an army unit is declared as an attacker at this planet, deal it 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a unit at this planet is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your opponent deploys a non-Elite unit at this planet, increase its cost by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Nurgle army unit you control. Reaction: After a combat round begins at this planet, each player deals 2 indirect damage among non-Nurgle units he controls at this planet, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you win a battle at this planet, take up to 2[Resource] from your opponent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Sacrifice this support to have each player discard cards from his hand until he has cards equal to or less than the highest printed cost among units he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may Deep Strike this card as an Action during the combat phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Reaction: After attached unit destroys an enemy unit by an attack, gain 1[Resource].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an Elite unit you control is destroyed, sacrifice this support to gain X[Resource]. X is equal to that unit's printed cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [Necron] Vehicle unit you control. Attached unit gets +2 HP. Interrupt: When this card is discarded as a shield card, attach it to the shielded unit instead of discarding it, if eligible.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an enemy army unit is destroyed while this unit is attacking, put a Cultist token into play at your HQ. (Limit once per attack.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Sacrifice a Cultist unit you control to move an ennemy army unit at an adjacent planet to this planet. (Limit one per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy a Daemon unit, put a Cultist token into play at your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a Daemon unit. Reveal it, add it to your hand, and put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [Chaos] unit you control. Attached unit gains Area Effect (1).

property.name: Text
property.value: While this unit is ready, each unit with printed cost 2 or lower at this planet cannot be declared as an attacker.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Wargear attachments. Area Effect (3). Flying.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Reaction: After a Dark Angels unit you control is destroyed, each other [Space Marine] army unit you control gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is declared as an attacker, destroy either a target army unit with printed cost 2 or lower at this planet or a target token unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to prevent 1 damage assigned from each attack made by a non-warlord unit this combat round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Elite unit you control at this planet gains, 'Interrupt: When this unit is assigned damage, reduce that damage by 2.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Sacrifice this support to put X Snotling tokens into play divided among any number of planets. X is the highest printed cost among units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, put 2 Khymera tokens into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, deal 2 damage to a target unit with printed cost 2 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit, exhaust a target non-Elite army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust up to 2 units each with printed cost X or lower. X is equal to the highest printed cost among units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: This unit gets +X ATK until the end of the phase. X is the number of [Resource] in your resource pool. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the headquarters phase begins each player gains [Resource] equal to the highest printed cost among units he control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you Deep Strike this unit. it gains Armorbane until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit you control. Reaction: After attached unit is assigned damage by an attack, prevent all but 2 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Discard a non-H card from your hand to move this unit to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is equal to the number of cards in your discard pile. Forced Reaction: After a phase or combat round at this planet begins, discard a card. If you have no cards in your hand discard this unit.
